department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: round box with flat top and bottom; top of cover decorated with eight-pointed star with floral starburst inside in white and white fading to brown quills; triangles with grids of quills around edge of top; edges of cover and box decorated with X motifs and grids in white quills; black thread
medium: Birchbark, quills, thread, plant fibers, pigments
title: Covered quillwork box
